mapper.sql: SELECT s.stack_id AS stackId, s.stack_name AS stackName, c.company_name AS companyName, w.workplace_name AS workplaceName, f.factory_category AS factoryCategory, f.factory_name AS factoryName, d.department_name AS departmentName FROM stack s LEFT JOIN workplace w ON s.workplace_id = w.workplace_id LEFT JOIN company c ON w.company_id = c.company_id LEFT JOIN factory f ON s.factory_id = f.factory_id LEFT JOIN department d ON f.department_id = d.department_id
mapper.select: SELECT sm.stack_measurement_id AS stackMeasurementId, sm.stack_id AS stackId, sm.pollutant_id AS pollutantId, sm.cycle_type AS cycleType, sm.is_completed AS isCompleted, p.pollutant_name_kr AS pollutantNameKR, p.pollutant_name_en AS pollutantNameEN, p.method, sm.is_measured AS isMeasured, sm.allow_value AS allowValue FROM stack_measurement `sm` INNER JOIN pollutant `p` on sm.pollutant_id = p.pollutant_id WHERE sm.stack_id = #{stackId};
